metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8376 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Tcpreplay 4.3.1. A NULL pointer dereferenceoccurred in the function get_layer4_v6() located at get.c. This can betriggered by sending a crafted pcap file to the tcpreplay-edit binary. Itallows an attacker to cause a Denial of Service (Segmentation fault) orpossibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
